component.name: Modal Dialog
component.description: A modal dialog component for displaying important information or requesting user actions in a focused overlay interface. Features customizable content, action buttons, and backdrop interaction handling for attention-grabbing notifications and user confirmations.

variants.name: Minimalism
variants.description: A modern modal dialog implementation with clean styling, clear content hierarchy, smooth animations, and responsive behavior. Effectively presents modal content with intuitive interaction controls, clear action buttons, and professional appearance.

variants.name: Material Design
variants.description: Modal Dialog implementation in Material Design style

variants.description: Modal Dialog implementation in Neumorphism style
